intro: Elatostema tsoongii, commonly known as the silver leaf plant, is a small herbaceous perennial native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Urticaceae, which includes plants commonly known as nettles. The plant is characterized by its succulent, silver-gray leaves that are often covered in fine hairs. It produces small, greenish-white flowers arranged in clusters, typically blooming in the spring. Elatostema tsoongii is often grown as an ornamental plant due to its attractive foliage and ease of care.
